entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 4.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1500 metres rising to 1800 metres in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:54 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. A few showers beginning near midnight. Snow level 1600 metres lowering to 900 metres overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:54 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
